DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to learn if a new 7 day patch ECG recording monitor can serve the same purpose as standard monitoring systems. The new 7day patch is significantly smaller and lighter than previous ECG recorders.
DOC.brief_title: BDx 7 Day ECG Patch: Electrode Adhesion Clinical Study
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose of this research is to evaluate ECG signal quality of the BDx 7 day ECG Patch heart monitor after 7 full days of wear, establishing that the device is safe and effective to wear for up to 7 days.
DOC.criteria: cardiac patient volunteers (5 male and 5 female) skin rash or infection over the sternum Sternal incision within 3 months from the date of enrollment
